Class BubbaPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • net.bubbaland.gui.BubbaPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AstTablePanel, BubbaDialogPanel, BubbaMainPanel, CivEditPanel, ControlsPanel, StopwatchPanel, TechnologyStoreDialog

    public abstract class BubbaPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Abstract class providing common methods for all trivia panels.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • hyperlinkedTextPaneFactory

        public javax.swing.JTextPane hyperlinkedTextPaneFactory(java.lang.String string,
                                                        java.awt.GridBagConstraints constraints,
                                                        int horizontalScroll,
                                                        int verticalScroll)
        Adds a word-wrapping text pane inside of a scrollable pane to the panel that can process hyperlink clicks. A reference to the text pane is returned so the text can be read/changed later.
        Parameters:
        client - TODO
        string - The initial string for the text pane
        constraints - The GridBag constraints
        horizontalScroll - The horizontal scroll bar policy (JScrollPane constants)
        verticalScroll - The vertical scroll bar policy (JScrollPane constants)
        Returns:
        The text pane inside the scroll pane

        Adds a word-wrapping text area inside of a scrollable pane to the panel. A reference to the text area is returned so the text can be read/changed later.
        Parameters:
        string - The initial string for the text area
        width - The width
        height - The height
        foreground - The foreground color
        background - The background color
        constraints - The GridBag constraints
        fontSize - The font size
        horizontalScroll - The horizontal scroll bar policy (JScrollPane constants)
        verticalScroll - The vertical scroll bar policy (JScrollPane constants)
        Returns:
        The text area inside the scroll pane
